name: Doodle Rockets
description:
You are in space and need to survive against deadly asteroids. But you are not alon. You can play with up to 4 players on your couch. Navigate your ship with a controller (preferred) or with a keybord (not recommend with four players).

You can change some values in the assist mode to balance the game because it is not really tested.

Do you like it? Why not?
